greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Alternating sum of "negabits". Replace (-2)^k with (-1)^k in negabinary expansion of n.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: a(n) = my(d=Vecrev(digits(negab(n)))); sum(k=1, #d, d[k]*(-1)^(k-1)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Aug 28 2019
results.author: _Marc LeBrun_, Oct 31 2001
